host_templates.alias: Template to check Windows server using NRPE protocol (NSClientpp 0.4.3)
host_templates.name: OS-Windows-NRPE

information.author: Centreon
information.changelog: * New export with comment on services template

description.value:
Plugin pack to monitor Microsoft Windows Server via NRPE:
* Counter-Active-Sessions
* Counter-Generic
* Cpu
* Disk
* EventLog
* Files
* Logfiles
* Memory
* NTP
* Process
* Services-Auto
* Services
* Swap
* Task
* Uptime

Plugin pack pour surveiller un serveur Microsoft Windows via NRPE :
* Counter-Active-Sessions
* Counter-Generic
* Cpu
* Disk
* EventLog
* Files
* Logfiles
* Memory
* NTP
* Process
* Services-Auto
* Services
* Swap
* Task
* Uptime

information.monitoring_procedure:
# Monitoring procedure ## Prerequisites ### Centreon Plugin Install this plugin on each needed poller: # install centreon-nrpe-plugin ### Nsclient++ This plugin pack requires the use of: * NSClient++ package provided by Merethis, installed and configured on your target server as described on [documentation](http://documentation.centreon.com) Note: If you use the NSClient++ installer provided by Merethis, the plugin is already included in centreon\_plugins.exe configured in NSClient++ ## Centreon Configuration ### Create a host using the appropriate template Go to *Configuration > Hosts* and click *Add*. Then, fill the form as shown by the following table:
Field Value

Host name

Name of the host

Alias

Host description

IP

Host IP Address

Monitored from

Monitoring Poller to use

Host Multiple Templates

OS-Windows-NRPE-custom

Relations > Parent Hostgroups tab
Click on the *Save* button.
information.name: Windows NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier si les services automatiques sont démarrés.}

{EN: Check that all auto-start services are running.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Services-Auto-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle du taux d'utilisation de la mémoire vive (RAM)}

{EN: Check the rate of the utilization of memory (RAM)}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Memory-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le taux d'utilisation des disques Windows.}

{EN: Check Windows disk usage.}

macros.value: type = 'fixed' and name not regexp '.*System Reserved.*'

service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Disks-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle du taux d'utilisation du CPU de la machine. Ce contrôle pourra remonter la moyenne du taux d'utilisation des CPU ainsi que le taux par CPU pour les CPU multi-c?ur.}

{EN: Check the rate of utilization of CPU for the machine. This check can give the average CPU utilization rate and the rate per CPU for multi-core CPU.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Cpu-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le nombre de sessions actives.}

{EN: Check active sessions.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Counter-Active-Sessions-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle du taux d'utilisation du CPU de la machine. Ce contrôle pourra remonter la moyenne du taux d'utilisation des CPU ainsi que le taux par CPU pour les CPU multi-c?ur.}

{EN: Check the rate of utilization of CPU for the machine. This check can give the average CPU utilization rate and the rate per CPU for multi-core CPU.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Counter-Generic-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'état des services Windows.}

{EN: Check windows services states.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Services-Generic-Name-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle les tâches planifiées Windows.}

{EN: Check windows scheduled task.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Task-Generic-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'uptime Windows.}

{EN: Check windows uptime.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Uptime-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle du taux d'utilisation de la mémoire virtuelle (SWAP)}

{EN: Check the rate of the utilization of virtual memory (SWAP)}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Swap-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle des processus (état, taille mémoire, nombres,...).}

{EN: Checks processes (state, memory size, numbers,...).}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Process-Generic-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier des fichiers/répertoires (taille, dernier accès,..).}

{EN: Check files/directories (size, last access,...).}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Files-Generic-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle les événements en erreurs dans les eventlogs.}

{EN: Check eventlogs errors.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Eventlog-Generic-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Controle les fichiers de logs.}

{EN: Check log files.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Logfiles-Generic-NRPE

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle la synchronisation avec un serveur NTP.}

{EN: Check the synchronization with an NTP server.}
service_templates.name: OS-Windows-Ntp-NRPE
